text: Peppa Pig and her friends are having a
wonderful date playing outside suddenly
it begins to rain and Peppa's friends
head home George
our time peppa and George must wait for
the rain to stop and wait and wait and
just when it seems as though the rain
will never stop it does mummy can we go
outside and play okay but be careful
it's still wet from the rain
look George a muddy puddle let's jump in
it pepper and George jump up and down in
the muddy puddle
look I see daddy coming home for more
oh hello there peppa and George what are
you two playing at we've been jumping in
this muddy puddle alright for what carry
on peppa and George do carry on
look the muddy puddle is bubbling
there's something inside it
George decides to see what's in the
muddy puddle George be careful suddenly
it begins to come out it's it's a
dinosaur Peppa George sometime look what
we found in a muddy puddle it's a
dinosaur oh my it certainly is big for a
toy dinosaur it's real oh I see well you
two got awfully dirty playing outside
now run along and take a bath Peppa
George in the dinosaur head upstairs to
the bathroom where peppa and George take
their bath good night George
goodnight dinosaur
